backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, tracks, mixes, permissions, and related data structures with getters, setters, and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lookup file containing short summaries for many frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, root container, and main client script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing theming, mixer screen, onboarding, profile setup, and mobile behavior tweaks.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginButton.t: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/features/history/MixHistory: Drawer UI listing local and backend mixes with metadata and optional download for local recordings.
frontend/src/features/library/LibraryDra: Drawer for selecting and loading tracks from local files or the streaming placeholder into a chosen deck.
frontend/src/features/library/LocalFileI: Handles local audio file import, analysis, and loading into a selected deck, with optional upload to user library.
frontend/src/features/library/StreamingP: Displays a placeholder UI indicating that streaming service integrations are not yet available.
frontend/src/features/mixer/AiControls.t: Provides AI mixing controls for BPM sync and automated transitions between decks.
frontend/src/features/mixer/Crossfader.t: Implements a draggable crossfader UI that updates the audio engine’s crossfade position with gesture support.
frontend/src/features/mixer/DeckPanel.ts: Renders a deck’s playback controls, waveform, track metadata, and performance tools, updating state from the audio engine.
Top header bar with app branding and buttons to open the library, history, settings, and login.
Main mixer layout managing deck state, audio engine, recording, and drawers for library, history, and settings.
frontend/src/features/mixer/PerformanceT: Adds deck performance controls including filter effects, loop toggling, and pinch gestures to adjust filter frequency.
frontend/src/features/mixer/ReactiveBack: Canvas-based particle backdrop that reacts to audio analyser intensity and resizes with the window.
frontend/src/features/mixer/RecordingCon: UI controls for starting/stopping recordings, saving mixes locally, and downloading the resulting audio blob.
frontend/src/features/mixer/WaveformCanv: Renders a reactive waveform with track structure overlays and playhead, driven by audio analyser intensity.
frontend/src/features/onboarding/Onboard: Multi-step onboarding modal introducing features and letting users choose beginner or pro mode.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileSet: Modal prompting the user to enter a name and save their DJ profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsD: Bottom sheet settings panel allowing users to switch DJ modes and access a footer link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDjMode.ts: Persisted state hook managing DJ mode and onboarding status in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useGestures.ts: Hook providing swipe, pinch, long-press, tap, and circular gesture detection for touch or pointer events.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useMixHistory.ts: Manages local and backend mix history, with saving to localStorage and authenticated backend persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls in React Query hooks for tracks, mixes, profiles, and libraries with caching and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrackAnalysis.ts: Exposes an async analyze function with progress tracking for audio track analysis.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrackLibrary.ts: Manages local and backend track libraries, merging based on authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables and neon-themed utility classes.
Implements audio analysis including BPM, key, waveform, energy, and structural inference.
frontend/src/lib/audio/AudioEngine.ts: Implements a dual‑deck audio engine with playback, looping, effects, analyzers, and crossfader routing.
frontend/src/lib/audio/effects.ts: Builds an audio effect chain with filter, echo, and reverb nodes and exposes setters to adjust them.
frontend/src/lib/audio/recording.ts: Implements a mix recorder using MediaRecorder to capture audio streams into a WebM blob.
frontend/src/lib/mix/aiTransition.ts: Runs an automated crossfade and optional filter/echo effects over time between two decks.
frontend/src/lib/mix/beatmatch.ts: Provides BPM sync, beat quantization, and beat grid calculation helpers.
frontend/src/lib/recommendations/recomme: Scores and ranks tracks based on BPM, key, energy, and randomness to suggest next tracks.
frontend/src/lib/visuals/audioReactive.t: Extracts smoothed intensity and frequency-band levels from an analyser node for visuals.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Contains helpers for downloading blobs and generating timestamped mix filenames.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, features, and design notes for the AI DJ mixer app.
